about_the_game:
Our characters suddenly find themselves awakening in a graveyard, surrounded by an atmosphere of uncertainty and fear. Their mission is to find and defuse a bomb, a task that unfolds in the midst of a dark world where they must also uncover their identities and pasts. The train journey they embark on to find the bomb is far from an ordinary trip; every moment holds new dangers and mysteries. The eerie events they encounter on the train and at the stations greatly intensify the mission's challenges. Along the way, their meeting with the conductor becomes inevitable. As they carry the radioactive bomb, the train cars pull them into unknown dimensions and mysterious places. Each new location is filled with dark secrets and shrouded in shadows of the past. With every step, our characters engage in an epic struggle.


In this unique train adventure, you don't just move from one wagon to another. Some doors open to different worlds, interactions, and side stories. As you step into a seemingly normal wagon, you find yourself in an entirely different place, sharing this experience with other players.


The stations add an extra layer of excitement to the journey. Each station acts as a gateway to dark secrets, with random creatures lurking behind these doors. These creatures guard hidden perils deep within the stations. Players must discover useful items and locate the kit required to neutralize the bomb. Time is of the essence; the mission must be completed before the train departs. In this race against time, find the bombs and survive!

short_description: In this 4-player online co-op horror game, you embark on an adventure by summoning a mysterious train. You must find and defuse bombs in an 8-carriage train. However, beware, there's a blind conductor and dangerous creatures chasing you. Race against time, find the bombs, and survive!
